org.mini2Dx.ecs.system

Class UUIDSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ecs.system.UUIDSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    System<UUIDEntity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box2DSystem

    public abstract class UUIDSystem
extends Object
implements System<UUIDEntity>
    An abstract base implementation of System which stores UUIDEntity instances based on their UUID
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman
